title: Is it true that it took 58 years for the stock market to crash again after the first stock market crash of 1929 (1929-1987)? That gives me some sense of hope that there won't be a stock market crash this year. - Quora
tags: Stock Market Crashes and Major Drops

response.answer_text: With respect, it is a good idea to understand the subject you want to talk about before you display the level of your ignorance for all to see. First, you have not looked at the chart. Second with no knowledge you postulate. Otherwise your question is interesting.  This is a logarithmic chart because it looks ridiculous as linear, and this compares % moves. You will see how very wrong you are, and how VERY small the current fall actually is.

1987 wasn't such great crash. It was a rather abrupt and steep dive into bear territory. A great buying opportunity. You can't anticipate a crash, you can only be prepared. Keep ample cash reserves for buying the blood.
